name: MikoWorld
description:
Description
A calming non-linear point and click activity game with a variety of play items, tasks and games within a game. Originally made as a large Flash based web application it now comes as a standalone Flash .exe or .app for PC and Mac.

Primarily a dressing-up / design tool for creative younger girls interested in fashion and arts.

Contents include:
Clothing, hair and make-up coordination.
Garden Picnic.
Drawing and Painting.
Learning the time and calendar.
Piano keyboard.
Pollen (arcade style ladybird game)
Jigsaw puzzles.
Quizzes.
Birds (arcade style feed the birds game)
Catch butterflies.
Achievements

Game Info
MikoWorld version 2 comes as a standalone Adobe Flash projector and livecode launcher, no installation or plugins are required. Should work on all operating systems.
